title: Secret Admirer Quiz
description: Take this fun personality quiz to discover how many secret admirers you have! Spin the wheel and get a playful prediction about your love life. A lighthearted entertainment game that reveals amusing results about your attractiveness and charm.
controls: Enter your name and click the START button to spin the wheel. The wheel will rotate and stop at a random result, telling you how many people might have a crush on you. Share your result with friends or try again for a different outcome!
